chat.emptyStateDescription: Try “How to make a HTTP request in JavaScript” , “Give me the top 10 rock music in the 80s”, “Explain me how internet works”
chat.limitReachedDescription: You've used all of your queries for the month on this model/agent. Please start a new chat with another agent.

context.title: Conversation Context
context.description: List of folders and files used as context for this conversation

delete.label: Delete AI
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this AI? This action cannot be undone.

notFound.title: No available AIs
notFound.description: Connect your first AI to start asking Shinkai AI. Try connecting OpenAI

localAI.installText: After installing AI models on your local machine, they will become available as AI

disconnect.modalDescription: Are you sure you want to disconnect? This will permanently delete your data
disconnect.exportConnection: Before continuing, please<Link>export your connection</Link>to restore your connection at any time.

nodeUnavailable.title: Node Unavailable
nodeUnavailable.description: We're having trouble connecting to your Shinkai Node. Your node may be offline, or your internet connection may be down.
